data.name: Palace_Pal
data.comment: Plugin Name

data.name: Error_FirstTimeSetupRequired
data.value: Please finish the initial setup first.
data.comment: Before using any /pal command, the initial setup/agreeement needs to be completed.

data.name: Error_LoadFailed
data.comment: Shown when the plugin fails to load, with the placeholder filled with the exception message.

data.name: Error_WrongRepository
data.value: Please install this plugin from the official repository at {0} to continue using it.

data.name: Command_pal_HelpText
data.comment: Help text for the /pal command, shown in the Plugin Installer

data.name: Command_pal_UnknownSubcommand
data.comment: Error shown when using '/pal xxx' with an unknown argument 'xxx'.

data.name: Command_pal_stats_CurrentFloor
data.value: You can view statistics for the floor you're currently on by opening the 'Debug' tab in the configuration window.

data.name: Command_pal_stats_UnableToFetchStatistics
data.comment: Shown when /pal stats produces a server-side error, and the statistics window can't be loaded.

data.name: Error_CommandFailed
data.comment: Shown when '/pal ...' fails, with the placeholder filled with the exception message.

data.name: ConnectionError_NotOnline
data.comment: Shown if you attempt to connect to the server while you have selected 'never upload discoveries, only show traps and coffers i found myself'

data.name: ConnectionError_OldVersion
data.value: Your version of Palace Pal is outdated, please update the plugin using the Plugin Installer.
data.comment: Shown if the version is too old to create an account or log in.

data.name: ConnectionError_CreateAccountFailed
data.comment: Creating an account failed with an error code, but there is no (translated) error message for it.

data.name: ConnectionError_CreateAccountReturnedNoId
data.value: No account-id after account was attempted to be created.
data.comment: If the creation of an account was successful, we expect an account-id to be returned so we can log in. If this happens, the server sent an invalid response.

data.name: ConnectionError_InvalidAccountId
data.comment: The account id used was not found on the server.

data.name: ConnectionError_LoginFailed
data.comment: Logging in failed with an error code, but there is no (translated) error message for it.

data.name: ConnectionError_LoginReturnedNoToken
data.comment: The server sent no valid client token, even though the login was successful.

data.name: Config_Traps_HideImpossible
data.value: Hide traps not on current floor
data.comment: When a trap has no chance of appearing (after a pomander of safety/sight is used), hide it.

data.name: Config_Traps_HideImpossible_ToolTip
data.value: When using a Pomander of Sight, only the actual trap locations are visible, all other traps are hidden. When using a Pomander of Safety, all traps are hidden.

data.name: Config_HoardCoffers_HideImpossible
data.value: Hide hoard coffers not on current floor
data.comment: When a hoard coffer has no chance of appearing (after a pomander of safety/sight is used), hide it.

data.name: Config_HoardCoffers_HideImpossible_ToolTip
data.value: When using a Pomander of intuition, only the actual hoard coffer location is visible, all other (potential) hoard coffers are hidden.

data.name: Config_SilverCoffer_Show
data.value: Show silver coffers on current floor

data.name: Config_SilverCoffers_ToolTip
data.value: Shows nearby silver coffers (gear upgrades and magicites) on the current floor. This is not synchronized with other players and not saved between floors/runs.

data.name: Config_SilverCoffer_Filled
data.comment: Whether silver coffers should only be drawn with the circle outline or as filled circle.

data.name: Config_GoldCoffer_Show
data.value: Show gold coffers on current floor

data.name: Config_GoldCoffers_ToolTip
data.value: Shows nearby gold coffers (containing pomanders) on the current floor. This is not synchronized with other players and not saved between floors/runs.

data.name: Config_GoldCoffer_Filled
data.comment: Whether gold coffers should only be drawn with the circle outline or as filled circle.

data.name: Config_TestConnection_Connecting
data.comment: When clicking on the 'Test Connection' button, this is shown until a success/error message is available.

data.name: Config_ImportExplanation1
data.value: Using an export is useful if you're unable to connect to the server, or don't wish to share your findings.

data.name: Config_ImportExplanation2
data.value: Exports are (currently) generated manually, and they only include traps and hoard coffers encountered by 5 or more people. This may lead to higher floors having very sporadic coverage, but commonly run floors (e.g. PotD 51-60, HoH 21-30) are closer to complete.

data.name: Config_ImportExplanation3
data.value: If you aren't offline, importing a file won't have any noticeable effect.

data.name: Config_SelectImportFile_Hint
data.comment: When importing a file, this is the hint that shows up in the 'path' input box while no file has been selected.

data.name: Config_UndoImportExplanation1
data.value: Your last import was on {0}, which added the trap/hoard coffer database from {1} created on {2:d}.

data.name: Config_UndoImportExplanation2
data.value: If you think that was a mistake, you can remove all locations only found in the import (any location you've seen yourself is not changed).

data.name: ConfigTab_Renderer
data.comment: Configuration tab to select Splatoon or Simple as rendering backend

data.name: Config_SelectRenderBackend
data.value: Select which render backend to use for markers:

data.name: Config_Renderer_Splatoon
data.comment: Splatoon plugin. Do not localize.

data.name: Config_Renderer_Splatoon_Hint
data.value: default, required Splatoon to be installed

data.name: Config_Splatoon_DrawCircles
data.value: Draw trap & coffer circles around self
data.comment: To test the Splatoon integration, you can draw markers around yourself.

data.name: Config_Debug_NotInADeepDungeon
data.value: You are NOT in a deep dungeon.

data.name: Explanation_1
data.value: Pal Palace will show where potential trap & hoard coffer locations are.

data.name: Explanation_2
data.value: To do this, using a pomander to reveal trap or treasure chest locations will save the position of what you see.

data.name: Explanation_3
data.value: Ideally, we want to discover every potential trap and chest location in the game, but doing this alone is very tedious. Floor 51-60 has over 300 trap locations and over 290 coffer locations - and we don't know if that map is complete. Higher floors naturally see fewer runs, making solo attempts to map the place much harder.

data.name: Explanation_4
data.value: You can decide whether you want to share traps and chests you find with the community, which likewise also will let you see chests and coffers found by other players. This can be changed at any time. No data regarding your FFXIV character or account is ever sent to our server.

data.name: Config_UploadMyDiscoveries_ShowOtherTraps
data.value: Upload my discoveries, show traps & coffers other players have discovered

data.name: Config_NeverUploadDiscoveries_ShowMyTraps
data.value: Never upload discoveries, show only traps and coffers I found myself

data.name: Agreement_Warning1
data.value: While this is not an automation feature, you're still very likely to break the ToS.

data.name: Agreement_Warning2
data.value: Other players in your party can always see where you're standing/walking.

data.name: Agreement_Warning3
data.value: As such, please avoid mentioning it in-game and do not share videos/screenshots.

data.name: Agreement_UsingThisOnMyOwnRisk
data.value: I understand I'm using this plugin on my own risk.

data.name: Agreement_PickOneOption
data.value: Please chose one of the options above.
data.comment: Shown if neither of the two radio buttons in the setup setup window are selected.

data.name: ImportCompleteStatistics
data.value: Imported {0} new trap locations and {1} new hoard coffer locations.
data.comment: After the import of a *.pal file, the number of traps/hoard coffers is shown as a summary.
